text.__SUMMARY__: Penicillium jiangxiense is a species of the genus of Penicillium which was isolated in Jiangxi in China.
text.Further reading:
Xiao, J. H.; Fang, N; Liu, Z. L.; Chen, D. X. (2008). "Investigation on antitumor mechanism of polysaccharide from medicinal fungus Penicillium jiangxiense". Zhong Yao Cai. 31 (1): 71–6. PMID 18589753.
